title: Imam forced to lead prayer and do a bidah congregational dua, CAN he to soften their hearts?
transcript: Mu'izz from Saudi or Mu'arif Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh I have one question regarding Congregational Dua and in India for example I am from India so in India they will since I have a very good Qirat they will force me to participate in Congregational Dua after every Fardh Salat so Sheikh my question is am I allowed to participate in such Duas so I can bring their hearts closer when you say that they force you if they force you to take off your clothes you would do so no Sheikh regarding force me to pray Salat as an Imam okay pray the Salat and after Salam don't do anything Barakallahu feek you
